org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest

Interface TavernaServerRunREST


  • @RolesAllowed(value="ROLE_tavernauser")
public interface TavernaServerRunREST
    This represents how a Taverna Server workflow run looks to a RESTful API.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TavernaServerRunREST.PathNames
      Factored out path names used in the TavernaServerRunREST interface and related places.
      static class  TavernaServerRunREST.RunDescription
      The description of where everything is in a RESTful view of a workflow run.

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        @GET
 @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerRunREST.RunDescription getDescription(@Nonnull @Context
                                                                                                                                             javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
        Describes a workflow run.
        Parameters:
        ui - About the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        The description.

      • destroy

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/")
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response destroy()
                                                               throws NoUpdateException
        Deletes a workflow run.
        Returns:
        An HTTP response to the deletion.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException - If the user may see the handle but may not delete it.

      • runOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="/")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response runOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getWorkflow

        @GET
 @Path(value="workflow")
 @Produces(value={"application/vnd.taverna.t2flow+xml","application/vnd.taverna.scufl2.workflow-bundle","application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
Workflow getWorkflow()
        Returns the workflow document used to create the workflow run.
        Returns:
        The workflow document.

 @Path(value="workflow")

 @Path(value="name")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getName()

      • setName

        @PUT
 @Path(value="name")
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String setName(String name)
                                                                                                          throws NoUpdateException
        Set the workflow name.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException - If the user is not permitted to change the workflow.

 @Path(value="name")

javax.ws.rs.core.Response nameOptions()

      • getMainProfileName

        @GET
 @Path(value="profile")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getMainProfileName()
        Produces the name of the workflow's main profile.
        Returns:
        The main profile name, or the empty string if there is no such profile.

      • getProfiles

        @GET
 @Path(value="profile")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
ProfileList getProfiles()
        Get a description of the profiles supported by the workflow document used to create this run.
        Returns:
        A description of the supported profiles.

 @Path(value="profile")
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response profileOptions()
        Produce the workflow profile HTTP operations.

      • getSecurity

        @Path(value="security")
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerSecurityREST getSecurity()
                                                                 throws NotOwnerException
        Returns a resource that represents the workflow run's security properties. These may only be accessed by the owner.
        Returns:
        The security resource.
        Throws:
        NotOwnerException - If the accessing principal isn't the owning principal.

      • getExpiryTime

        @GET
 @Path(value="expiry")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getExpiryTime()
        Returns the time when the workflow run becomes eligible for automatic deletion.
        Returns:
        When the run expires.

      • setExpiryTime

        @PUT
 @Path(value="expiry")
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String setExpiryTime(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                         String expiry)
                                                                                                                  throws NoUpdateException
        Sets the time when the workflow run becomes eligible for automatic deletion.
        Parameters:
        expiry - When the run will expire.
        Returns:
        When the run will actually expire.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException - If the current user is not permitted to manage the lifetime of the run.

      • expiryOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="expiry")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response expiryOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getCreateTime

        @GET
 @Path(value="createTime")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getCreateTime()
        Returns the time when the workflow run was created.
        Returns:
        When the run was first submitted to the server.

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="createTime")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response createTimeOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getStartTime

        @GET
 @Path(value="startTime")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getStartTime()
        Returns the time when the workflow run was started (through a user-driven state change).
        Returns:
        When the run was started, or null.

      • startTimeOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="startTime")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response startTimeOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getFinishTime

        @GET
 @Path(value="finishTime")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getFinishTime()
        Returns the time when the workflow run was detected to have finished.
        Returns:
        When the run finished, or null.

      • finishTimeOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="finishTime")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response finishTimeOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getStatus

        @GET
 @Path(value="status")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getStatus()
        Gets the current status of the workflow run.
        Returns:
        The status code.

      • setStatus

        @PUT
 @Path(value="status")
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response setStatus(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                                        String status)
                                                                                                                                 throws NoUpdateException,
                                                                                                                                        BadStateChangeException
        Sets the status of the workflow run. This does nothing if the status code is the same as the run's current state.
        Parameters:
        status - The new status code.
        Returns:
        Description of what status the run is actually in, or a 202 to indicate that things are still changing.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException - If the current user is not permitted to update the run.
        BadStateChangeException - If the state cannot be modified in the manner requested.

      • statusOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="status")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response statusOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getWorkingDirectory

        @Path(value="wd")
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerDirectoryREST getWorkingDirectory()
        Get the working directory of this workflow run.
        Returns:
        A RESTful delegate for the working directory.

      • getListeners

        @Path(value="listeners")
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerListenersREST getListeners()
        Get the event listeners attached to this workflow run.
        Returns:
        A RESTful delegate for the list of listeners.

      • getInputs

        @Path(value="input")
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerInputREST getInputs(@Nonnull @Context
                                                                javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
        Get a delegate for working with the inputs to this workflow run.
        Parameters:
        ui - About the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        A RESTful delegate for the inputs.

      • getOutputFile

        @GET
 @Path(value="output")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getOutputFile()
        Get the output Baclava file for this workflow run.
        Returns:
        The filename, or empty string to indicate that the outputs will be written to the out directory.

      • getOutputDescription

        @GET
 @Path(value="output")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
OutputDescription getOutputDescription(@Nonnull @Context
                                                                                                                                      javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
                                                                                                                               throws BadStateChangeException,
                                                                                                                                      FilesystemAccessException,
                                                                                                                                      NoDirectoryEntryException
        Get a description of the outputs.
        Parameters:
        ui - About the URI used to access this operation.
        Returns:
        A description of the outputs (higher level than the filesystem).
        Throws:
        BadStateChangeException - If the run is in the Initialized state.
        FilesystemAccessException - If problems occur when accessing the filesystem.
        NoDirectoryEntryException - If things are odd in the filesystem.

      • setOutputFile

        @PUT
 @Path(value="output")
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String setOutputFile(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                         String filename)
                                                                                                                  throws NoUpdateException,
                                                                                                                         FilesystemAccessException,
                                                                                                                         BadStateChangeException
        Set the output Baclava file for this workflow run.
        Parameters:
        filename - The Baclava file to use, or empty to make the outputs be written to individual files in the out subdirectory of the working directory.
        Returns:
        The Baclava file as actually set.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException - If the current user is not permitted to update the run.
        FilesystemAccessException - If the filename is invalid (starts with / or contains a .. segment).
        BadStateChangeException - If the workflow is not in the Initialized state.

      • outputOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="output")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response outputOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

        @Path(value="interaction")
 @Nonnull
InteractionFeedREST getInteractionFeed()
        Get a handle to the interaction feed.
        Returns:

      • getStdout

        @GET
 @Path(value="stdout")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getStdout()
                                                                               throws NoListenerException
        Returns:
        The stdout for the workflow run, or empty string if the run has not yet started.
        Throws:
        NoListenerException

 @Path(value="stdout")

 @Nonnull
String getStderr()
                                                                               throws NoListenerException
        Returns:
        The stderr for the workflow run, or empty string if the run has not yet started.
        Throws:
        NoListenerException

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="stderr")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response stderrOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getUsage

        @GET
 @Path(value="usage")
 @Produces(value="application/xml")
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getUsage()
                                                                                                     throws NoListenerException,
                                                                                                            JAXBException
        Returns:
        The usage record for the workflow run, wrapped in a Response, or "empty content" if the run has not yet finished.
        Throws:
        NoListenerException
        JAXBException

      • usageOptions

 @Path(value="usage")

        Get an outline of the operations supported.

 @Path(value="log")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getLogContents()
        Returns:
        The log for the workflow run, or empty string if the run has not yet started.

 @Path(value="run-bundle")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.wf4ever.robundle+zip")
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getRunBundle()
        Returns:
        The log for the workflow run, or empty string if the run has not yet started.

 @Path(value="run-bundle")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response runBundleOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.

      • getGenerateProvenance

        @GET
 @Path(value="generate-provenance")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
boolean getGenerateProvenance()
        Returns:
        Whether to create the run bundle for the workflow run. Only usefully set-able before the start of the run.

      • setGenerateProvenance

        @PUT
 @Path(value="generate-provenance")
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
boolean setGenerateProvenance(boolean provenanceFlag)
                                                                                                                                        throws NoUpdateException
        Parameters:
        provenanceFlag - Whether to create the run bundle for the workflow run. Only usefully set-able before the start of the run.
        Returns:
        What it was actually set to.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException

      • generateProvenanceOptions

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="generate-provenance")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response generateProvenanceOptions()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.
